description.en:
"DeepOnion (ONION) describes itself as a decentralized, open-source, community-driven cryptocurrency that offers multi-layered privacy and everyday use cases. It uses an x13 hybrid PoW/PoS to secure the network. DeepOnion claims to be one of the earliest cryptos to integrate the Tor network into the DeepOnion wallet, which has reportedly not leaked any IP addresses since its release on 12 July 2017.

Features delivered by the DeepOnion team:

DeepSend as a base solution for private and untraceable payments without relying on cryptographic encryption.
DeepVault to register and verify digital files with the DeepOnion blockchain.
VoteCentral, a balanced and non-biased voting platform for the community.
WooCommerce, Shopify and OpenCart payment plugins for merchants.
More info can be found at (https://DeepOnion.org)"

status_updates.description:
New DeepOnion Maintenance Release V2.3.2
This is maintenance release with updated checkpoints and a minor DeepSend bugfix.

This fixes rare issue when the DeepSend cluster is unable to agree on how to cancel DeepSend transaction that has timedout.

https://deeponion.org/community/threads/new-deeponion-maintenance-release-v2-3-2.46222/

DeepOnion Pow block rewards halved.
Mineable Pow rewards dropped from 1.0 ONION to 0.50 ONION
Next year these days we'll see another halve. from 0.5 to 0.25 ONION reward per block.
https://deeponion.org/community/threads/deeponion-pow-blockhalving-happened.46252/

DeepSend  v2.3.1 Released!  
This release fixes an issue in DeepSend that where service nodes advertised them selfs with difference indexes resulting in an increasing number of nodes never being able to start the DeepSend process.
There is also a privacy update the will ensure that an address is never reused for a DeepSend transaction. This adds another of obfuscation to the process: https://deeponion.org/community/threads/new-release-v2-3-1.46138/

Version 2.3.0.1 is a mandatory release with the following improvements:
CSV Fork Configured
Tor Upgrade
Tor v3 Address Support
Tor v2 support until CSV fork
DeepSend Protocol improvements
Updated Checkpoints

The fork is set for the 1st of July 2021. 
https://deeponion.org/community/threads/new-release-2-3-0-1-mandatory-upgrade-1st-july-fork.45850/

The DeepOnion Electrum wallet is finally here. It comes with multiple benefits to facilitate the most convenient interaction with the DeepOnion network for a fast and smooth experience. https://deeponion.org/community/threads/the-deeponion-electrum-wallet-released.45757/

It is our pleasure to present you with another competition. It's a trading competition hosted by Coinsbit.
Accounts will be ranked according to the maximum trading volume of executed orders.
5 winners will share a prize pool of 5,000 ONION. https://deeponion.org/community/threads/deeponion-presents-coinsbit-trading-competition.45638/

Hi DeepOnion community!

We are pleased to announce another exchange listing! Let´s welcome TradeOgre to the DeepOnion family! TradeOgre is a popular non-KYC exchange. Very easy to use. You only need one email address and that´s all!

The pair ONION/BTC is already live. You can see it here: https://tradeogre.com/exchange/BTC-ONION.
